Text:
Hello 2023! 🎉 Wishing a very happy New Year to all Nevadans. May it be filled with health and happiness.

¡Le damos la bienvenida al 2023! 🎉 Les deseo a todos los nevadenses un año nuevo muy feliz. Que sea lleno de salud y felicidad.

Each month, we highlight a Nevada woman in STEM who is breaking down barriers and serving as a role model for young girls and women across our state.

Check out the 12 incredible #WomenInSTEM we highlighted this year! https://t.co/g59ZRwffZj

ICYMI: My bipartisan bill to strengthen tourism in NV & across the country is now law.

Travel & tourism are key to our state’s economy & workforce, & now there will be someone in the federal government tasked with implementing a national strategy.
https://t.co/cyNjfTUE5m

Thank you to my friend 
@yairlapid for your service & leadership as Israel’s Prime Minister. I know you’ll continue working to strengthen the U.S.-Israel relationship, promote regional peace & security, defend democracy, combat antisemitism, & fight rising bigotry & intolerance.

Sam Lionel dedicated his life to  bettering NV – he saw Las Vegas’ potential and invested in growing our city. He served his country and his community with pride. He was a friend and a leader. My thoughts are with his family and loved ones.
https://t.co/svpCS9OUgw

Nevada is home to incredible wildlife that makes our state special.

On the anniversary of the enactment of the Endangered Species Act, we must recommit to protecting threatened and endangered wildlife for generations to come.

Harry Reid was a poor kid from Searchlight who went on to transform Nevada & the country during his decades of service in the Senate.

It's been one year since we lost him, but his memory & his legacy continue to live on.

Sending my love to Landra & the entire Reid family today. https://t.co/suK3XG4f48

ICYMI: Better access to stable, high-speed internet is coming to Nevada thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law I helped write and pass.

These broadband investments will make life a little bit easier for Nevadans across our state.
https://t.co/9N5cVWQmGW
Happy Birthday, @GovSisolak! Thank you for everything you’ve done to support Nevada families & make our state a better place to live.

To all those celebrating in Nevada and across the country, happy first day of #Kwanzaa!

I hope you have a joyful holiday. https://t.co/HuJvNNGokD

Merry Christmas! 🎄 May your day be full of joy and time with the ones you love.

¡Feliz Navidad! Que hoy día esté lleno de alegría y tiempo para compartir junto a sus seres queridos. https://t.co/DPFRZ89RlY

Wishing a Merry Christmas Eve to those celebrating. I hope it's full of family, food, and a @Raiders win!

Les deseo una Feliz Nochebuena a todos los que celebran hoy. Espero que la pasen en familia y con sus seres queridos. Y esperemos que los @Raiders ganen!

¡Encantada de celebrar los 200 años de relaciones bilaterales entre los Estados Unidos y México!

Espero que sigamos trabajando juntos durante muchos años más.

Glad to join in celebrating 200 years of U.S.-Mexico bilateral relations!
I look forward to continuing to work together for many years to come. https://t.co/P9MOWzlnrL

As we look back on 2022, I’m proud of everything my office and I were able to accomplish for Nevadans through casework, bipartisan legislation, and community outreach.

Here are some of our accomplishments by the numbers. ⬇️ https://t.co/n1M5yP7pff
2022 was a big year! We accomplished so much for NV – creating good-paying jobs, lowering health care costs, tackling gun violence, supporting our military, and so much more. https://t.co/IUbVSwUthC

The 2023 bipartisan government funding bill has passed the Senate!
 
It includes major wins for NV I helped secure, including provisions for:
✅Travel & tourism
✅Affordable housing
✅Veterans
✅Mental health
✅Law enforcement
✅Fire suppression
✅Cybersecurity
✅STEM education

Ukrainian President @ZelenskyyUa has shown immense resilience, bravery, and valor in the face of unprovoked Russian aggression and brutality.

It's an honor to welcome him to the United States Capitol and show him that we continue to stand firmly with Ukraine. https://t.co/UPuKzBqJ7M

NEWS: The Senate has *passed* my bipartisan bill with @MarshaBlackburn, the Civilian Cyber Security Reserve Act, to ensure @CISAgov is able to quickly mobilize qualified civilian cybersecurity personnel in times of crisis. This is a big cybersecurity win for our nation.

🚨 My bipartisan Data Mapping to Save Moms’ Lives Act is now law!

Here's how this bill works to improve outcomes for expecting mothers and save lives. ⬇️ https://t.co/lWqC8aCPtt

As a member of @SASCDems, I was proud to help shape this year's national defense bill and secure some key bipartisan wins for Nevada and our national security.
https://t.co/FXiLlulIbu

We're proud to share that this year's bipartisan funding bill includes over $167 million for 85 projects across Nevada. These projects will invest in public safety, clean water, mental health services, infrastructure, and more.

Excited to share that @NTIAgov has awarded $5.7M to help ensure all Nevadans have access to high-speed internet!

The grants, which come from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law I helped write and pass, will help with the planning, deployment, and adoption of broadband across NV.

We must do everything we can to protect our veterans’ personal information and medical records.

I'm glad to see the Senate pass my bipartisan bill with @MarshaBlackburn to ensure the VA addresses this issue.

Next stop: @POTUS desk to be signed into law!

Today we bid farewell to my friend @SenatorLeahy as he retires after serving the state of Vermont for decades.

His wisdom and steadfast leadership will be missed in the Senate. Wishing him a wonderful retirement!

.@ChrisMurphyCT learned the hard way – never bet against Las Vegas!

Thank you friend for paying up on our WNBA bet, and congratulations again to the @LVAces on an incredible season. 🏀

Victory sure is sweet! https://t.co/LQ9kmDTW4j

This is a huge win for NV: my bipartisan bill to strengthen U.S. travel and tourism is included in this year’s government funding legislation.

This industry and its workforce are the backbone of our state’s economy and I will keep fighting until this bill is signed into law.

Awesome to see @unevadareno students once again clinch a top spot in the @NatlCyberLeague Fall 2022 competition season! Investing in our nation's cybersecurity workforce is critical, and I'm glad to see the future of Nevada's cyber workforce is so strong.

Amidst a wave of anti-Jewish bigotry & violence, @gillibrandny, @SenGaryPeters, & I are calling on Senate leaders to robustly fund @FEMA's Nonprofit Security Grant Program to protect communities from violence. As a former synagogue president, I know how critical this funding is.

NEWS: Our bipartisan bill to help tackle human trafficking by requiring the posting of the national human trafficking hotline in public transit areas and restrooms is on its way to @POTUS to be signed into law.

From my family to yours, happy Hanukkah!

To all those celebrating, I hope your Hanukkah is a joyous holiday filled with love and light.

Built in 1860 to provide protection for early settlers, Fort Churchill State Park is located in Lyon County & makes for a great trip to learn more about our state's rich history. #TeamRosen recently stopped by Buckland Station to learn more. https://t.co/JXlUuRjF5Z

I was proud to help pass the bipartisan PACT Act to ensure all toxic-exposed veterans have access to the health care they deserve. Don't miss the @VALasVegas North Las Vegas VA Medical Center town hall to help vets seeking benefits under this new law.

HAPPENING TOMORROW! ⬇️⬇️

I strongly condemn the closure of the Lachin corridor and the reported denial to the region of gas supplies, which are used for home heating. This could have serious humanitarian consequences for the Armenian people, and I urge a deescalation of tensions.

This year's national defense bill includes a well-deserved pay raise for our troops, strengthens our national security, and brings more than $50 million for military construction projects to NV.

Here are the other major wins for Nevada that I worked to include ⬇️ https://t.co/PrubGNdcWt

The U.S. has one of the highest maternal mortality rates among developed countries. Soon, my bipartisan bill to help save lives will be signed into law and help us target broadband investments to improve telehealth services in areas with poor maternal health outcomes.

The opioid crisis continues to impact far too many families across NV and our nation. Last night, I was glad the Senate passed the bipartisan END FENTANYL Act that I co-sponsored to ensure law enforcement is better prepared to address this crisis with updated tools and training.
#TeamRosen is always happy to support @SNHDinfo and the great work you do to connect the Las Vegas community to health care.

What a joy to have @Astrid_NV in DC!

She’s a fearless Nevadan who fights for & empowers our immigrant community, & inspires us all to dream big. I'll always stand with Dreamers like Astrid & continue to push for comprehensive immigration reform with a pathway to citizenship. https://t.co/KyoRvrzio2

In order to combat rising antisemitism, we need a whole-of-government approach to tackle this scourge.

At yesterday’s @HelsinkiComm hearing, I urged greater interagency coordination, and shared the work I've been doing to combat anti-Jewish bigotry. https://t.co/xblKkJvNIK

Spoke with @UFWupdates leaders and members about the importance of our nation's farmworkers, and how we need to continue ensuring the men and women working these jobs have the support and resources they need. https://t.co/XWRw8DEQxK

My Data Mapping to Save Moms’ Lives Act has passed both houses of Congress & will soon be law!

This bipartisan bill will require @FCC to identify areas of both high rates of poor maternal health outcomes & lack of broadband to make critical investments to improve access to care.

While this summer we passed the most significant bipartisan breakthrough on gun safety legislation in decades – our work isn't over. Let's recommit ourselves today to combating gun violence & protecting our children, our families, & our communities, once & for all.
Yet over the last decade, we've continued to witness countless mass shootings, devastating communities & families, including in Las Vegas, Parkland, Uvalde, & across the country.

A decade—that's how long it's been since 20 innocent children & 6 educators were murdered at Sandy Hook Elementary.

No matter the time that's passed, none of us can forget the pain we felt as parents watching the news that day. No parent or community should ever experience that.

Recent court decisions seeking to strike down DACA have left thousands of Nevadans and their families in limbo.

That’s why I’m calling on the Senate to vote on a standalone permanent legislative fix for Dreamers, while we continue fighting for comprehensive immigration reform. https://t.co/fhAahUeAV2

Today is a good day!

The federal government will *finally* protect marriage equality and the rights of all LGBTQ couples who get married.

In NV, legal cannabis small businesses have created jobs & boosted our economy, but they still lack access to basic banking services. I'll continue fighting to get the bipartisan SAFE Banking Act passed, which will increase safety & create more opportunities for these businesses.

Since 1636, the @USNationalGuard has stood ready to serve our nation, devoting their lives to our defense and serving our communities in times of crisis.

Wishing them a happy birthday, and a special thank you to our @NVNationalGuard!

Modernizing @fallon_nas Range Training Complex has taken years of negotiations, & I'm proud that this year's NDAA includes the NV delegation's compromise proposal that meets our national security requirements, increases conservation, & addresses Tribal and local government needs. https://t.co/g6U6bA50CM

As we prepare to celebrate Hanukkah, it was wonderful to join @AmbHerzog at the Festival of Lights.

Hanukkah reminds us that when we hold firm to our values, beliefs, and faith, it can become a source of light that – no matter the odds – becomes impossible to extinguish.

Last week, I led my colleagues in calling on @POTUS to develop a national strategy to combat antisemitism.

🚨 I’m pleased to see that he's going to develop such a strategy and take the steps necessary to improve interagency coordination and effectively combat this scourge.

I'm proud to have helped secure wins for NV in this year's national defense bill, including:

✅A new Army @NVNationalGuard Readiness Center in Reno
✅A new aircraft maintenance hangar at @fallon_nas
✅Planning & design funding for a new dorm at @NellisAFB
https://t.co/dYkddH44Vf

Ajanaé Williams, a scientist with @NNSANevada, is our December #WomanInSTEM!

Born and raised in Las Vegas and a graduate of @unlv, Ajanaé’s experience, along with her insatiable curiosity about science, inspires other young women to enter STEM fields. https://t.co/EM4TUOXwYf
Today I'm looking forward to the @ArmyNavyGame – America's football game! #ArmyNavy 🏈

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law continues to make historic investments across Nevada, including strengthening our booming tourism industry.

To ensure communities across our nation continue to receive investments, we need strong oversight of the implementation of these funds.

The NDAA also includes important provisions for Tribes in NV, including permanently protecting over half a million acres of public land & investing in tribal & cultural resources.

Glad to have worked with leaders from the Walker River Paiute Tribe & Fallon Paiute Shoshone Tribe. https://t.co/JgmICN6WOT
Great news! Our bipartisan bill to protect marriage equality in federal law and ensure all Americans enjoy the same rights to marry who they love is headed to @POTUS desk to become LAW. ❤️

#TeamRosen was glad to meet with leaders and members of Rebel Vets from the @unlv Student Veterans Center and present them with a flag flown over the U.S. Capitol in honor of the 10th anniversary of their center. https://t.co/us0Rl2Lxy7

Russia has committed egregious human rights abuses in Ukraine. Yesterday, my bipartisan legislation to hold Russia accountable for these crimes passed the @SFRCdems and is one step closer to becoming law.

La brecha salarial es real, y afecta más a las mujeres de comunidades de color.

Hoy, en el Día de la Igualdad de Salarios para Latinas, recordamos que no debemos parar de luchar hasta que logremos la justicia salarial.

The pay gap is real – and it hits women from communities of color the hardest.

Today, on #LatinaEqualPayDay, we are reminded that we must not stop fighting until we achieve pay fairness.

I'm glad Brittney Griner will be back home with her family after months of unjust detention in Russia. We must continue fighting to bring back home Paul Whelan and all Americans wrongly detained abroad.

I was proud to help pass the bipartisan PACT Act to ensure veterans have access to the health care they deserve.

On 12/17, @DeptVetAffairs is hosting a town hall at @VALasVegas North Las Vegas VA Medical Center to help vets seeking benefits under this new law. Spread the word!

This summer, we passed the most significant bipartisan breakthrough on gun safety legislation in decades – but our work isn't over.

I met with Nevada physicians to hear their stories about the impact of gun violence on our communities, and discuss actions to address this crisis. https://t.co/b7JPIJzajg

🚨 A very big win for rural NV included in this year's national defense bill: My legislation to improve airport and water infrastructure, support public parks and tourism opportunities, and protect wilderness areas in Lander County will soon be law!

Nevada & Western states continue to face serious drought – threatening farms, ranches, & livelihoods. I'm joining a bipartisan group of colleagues in urging @USDA to help Western states conserve water, improve water infrastructure, & support our ranchers.
https://t.co/rBvXsg8519

On #PearlHarbor Remembrance Day, we honor the servicemembers who defended our freedoms and made the ultimate sacrifice.

The legacy of the USS Nevada and those we lost will continue to live on.

Modernizing @fallon_nas Range Training Complex is @USNavy’s #1 priority. Our compromise package works for NV by including conservation for half a million acres of public lands & key Tribal protections. I’m proud this landmark achievement will be in the national defense bill.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law I helped write and pass has made historic investments in our state.

It was great meeting with @abt_company, a battery manufacturing and recycling company in Reno that's benefiting from the bill through nearly $70M in grant funding. https://t.co/OUWfl0MtQC

On January 6th, 2021, U.S. Capitol Police officers and local law enforcement put themselves in harm’s way to protect our democracy. I'm forever grateful for their service and glad they are receiving the Congressional Gold Medal.

With antisemitism rising in the U.S. and around the world, I'm leading a bipartisan, bicameral group of 120+ colleagues in urging @POTUS to develop a unified national strategy to combat antisemitism and strengthen interagency coordination.
https://t.co/8VaXsu46Mw

Legally-operating cannabis small businesses in Nevada and across the country deserve full access to @SBAgov loans and resources. I'll continue working to ensure access to basic services and resources for these small businesses.
https://t.co/lapi8kgURQ

Reminder that there are 2⃣ more days of Medicare Open Enrollment.

Thanks to the Inflation Reduction Act I helped pass, Nevada’s seniors will benefit from lower health care costs.

Visit https://t.co/myxBMELOjf to choose the best plan for you.

Human trafficking is an issue that transcends communities, borders, & party lines. I’m helping introduce a bipartisan bill to require the posting of the national human trafficking hotline in public restrooms & on public transit to ensure it’s more visible to help those in need.

Happy birthday, @AFLCIO! For the past 67 years, the AFL-CIO has led workers throughout Nevada and across the country in the fight for safer working conditions, higher wages, equal pay, and paid family leave. Their leadership has been instrumental to the labor movement.

We need a whole-of-government approach to push back against antisemitism in all of its forms.

I am working with my colleagues from both sides of the aisle to call for a unified U.S. national strategy to combat antisemitism.
https://t.co/YPD07sgih3
Cheering on @USMNT today as they continue to fight to bring the World Cup home! Let's do this! ⚽️🇺🇸 #OnlyForward

ICYMI: Nearly $33M in federal funding is headed to NV to strengthen our public health system & protect families across our state.

Investments like this in public health are huge wins for everyone & I'm proud to have helped secure part of this funding.
https://t.co/KTIU1QealF

Great to meet with Jazmyne, a student with Sierra Nevada @DOLJobCorps who is studying to be a nurse.

I also showed her my "Wall of Women," full of women who inspire me everyday, and a reminder of what we can collectively achieve when we set our goals high. https://t.co/LCzVLNhbyC

In light of this problematic decision for the solar industry, I urge the Admin to take additional action to protect good-paying jobs by extending the two-year pause on new solar tariffs.
https://t.co/py20jZ1yva
Nevada is home to the most solar jobs per capita in the U.S., and I've been proud to lead the fight to protect American solar jobs and bolster our domestic solar production capabilities.

Nevada has no shortage of innovators, entrepreneurs, and small business owners. To help ensure they have the support they need to grow and thrive, I’m helping introduce legislation to reauthorize the Small Business Development Centers program.

Wonderful to have @MayorSchieve and Councilman Devon Reese stop by my DC office to discuss their work in Reno, and how we can continue partnering together at the federal and local levels to ensure Reno has the resources it needs. https://t.co/ijCTZdVlP2
Congratulations @RepHorsford on the honor of being elected Chair of the Congressional Black Caucus! I know you’ll continue to make Nevada proud as you take on this important leadership role.

There is no excuse for praising Hitler or making virulently antisemitic statements. It is wrong and it leads to violence towards Jews. Period.

We all MUST do everything in our power to combat antisemitism at every turn.

Antisemitism and Holocaust denial and distortion are incredibly dangerous, vile, and have deadly consequences. We cannot let people with large platforms spread this kind of hatred without calling it out.

While presiding over the Senate this morning, I wore red in honor of those we’ve lost and to recognize the incredible progress we've made against the spread of HIV.

On #WorldAIDSDay, we remain committed to raising awareness around the importance of combating this epidemic. https://t.co/HgnXpeC8E3

Investing in clean energy cuts costs, creates good-paying jobs, and helps our environment.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law I helped write and pass, public K-12 schools across the country can now apply for energy improvements from @ENERGY!
https://t.co/284BKUFgvE

When helping draft the broadband section of the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, I specifically fought to get high-speed internet to communities across Nevada.

I'm glad to announce that because of this, >$11M is headed to expand & improve internet access for Tribes in NV.

As we celebrate the passage of the #RespectForMarriageAct, I'm thinking of my dear friend @NelsonAraujoNV and his husband Steele, who gave me the honor of officiating their wedding.

Everyone deserves the right to marry the person they love. https://t.co/m08Wefj2lf

Excited to announce @CDCgov has awarded NV nearly $33M to improve critical public health infrastructure.

This funding, supported in part by the American Rescue Plan I helped pass, will enhance the capabilities of our public health professionals and programs to protect Nevadans.

Grateful to join with my colleagues & Jewish group leaders to discuss our work to combat rising antisemitism. We must continue to do more to combat this hate – like enhancing interagency cooperation, funding education programs, & strengthening security at Jewish institutions. https://t.co/e2RM76JW4Z

I’ve firmly supported the movement for a National Monument at Avi Kwa Ame – an area of significant cultural importance to Tribal nations that is rich with wildlife & beauty.

I joined @POTUS at today's Tribal Nations Summit, where he announced his commitment to protect this land. https://t.co/6SWTEQEv6x

It's been a pleasure working with @NNSANevada MSTS President Mark Martinez over the years – from tours of NNSS & the Remote Sensing Laboratory at @NellisAFB, to his DC visits – he's been a true partner in fighting for NV & national security.

Wishing him a wonderful retirement! https://t.co/ht6NjDShI9

It’s long past time that we protect marriage equality in federal law and ensure that all Americans enjoy the same rights to marry who they love.

Today, I’m proud to have voted to pass the bipartisan Respect for Marriage Act to do just that.
¡Vamos @USMNT! ¡Yo y todos los nevadenses los estamos apoyando hoy antes del decisivo partido de la #CopaMundial! ⚽️🇺🇸 #SoloPalante
Let's go @USMNT! I join all Nevadans in cheering you on ahead of today's decisive #WorldCup game! ⚽️🇺🇸 #OnlyForward

ICYMI: @abt_company in Reno is set to receive ~$10M to advance battery recycling & manufacturing from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law I helped write & pass. Just another example of how this landmark legislation is creating good-paying jobs & bolstering our clean energy future.

I'm ready to vote YES on the #RespectForMarriageAct to protect marriage equality.

All Americans deserve to know they will always have the same rights & freedoms to marry the person they love.

Let's get this bill passed!

I’m proud that my bipartisan resolution to designate November 2022 as National Hospice and Palliative Care Month to ensure that we recognize all the ways hospice & palliative care providers improve the quality of life of so many patients & their caregivers has passed the Senate.

Reminder that Open Enrollment is HAPPENING NOW‼️

Don’t miss your chance to sign up for affordable health care coverage now through January 15. Visit https://t.co/OWSqUoVMg2 to learn more.

Registered Apprenticeships allow students to earn while they learn, leaving these programs without debt and with a good-paying job.

Glad to see schools like @CSNCoyote are expanding opportunities for Nevadans to take advantage of these programs.
https://t.co/6TVEiV97l6
Electric @Raiders win last night in overtime!

ICYMI: I introduced a common sense bill to level the playing field for legally-operating cannabis small businesses so that they have access to the @SBAgov resources they need to thrive.
https://t.co/kS7DutNqxq
It's #SmallBusinessSaturday! What local small business are you supporting today? ⬇️⬇️

Tomorrow is #SmallBusinessSaturday – a time for us to show our appreciation and support of our favorite small business across Nevada.

Make sure to #ShopSmall this holiday season!

I was proud to help reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act to combat sexual and domestic violence.

On International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women, let's recommit ourselves to ensuring women have the support and resources they need.
Happy Thanksgiving, Nevada! From my family to yours, we're wishing everyone a day full of food, laughter, and love as we celebrate all we're grateful for this year. https://t.co/22gRCAZAix

This #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth, I’m honoring Staci Emm, a member of the Yerington Paiute Tribe & @unevadareno Extension Educator in Mineral County, as a #WomanInSTEM!

Her work has inspired Native students & women to get involved in STEM, & helped diversify the growing field. https://t.co/idrh3udIib

Had the pleasure of leading a @HFXforum panel focused on the U.S. and our allies maintaining technological superiority over autocratic adversaries.

To strengthen our capabilities in emerging technologies, we must invest in long-term workforce development and research. https://t.co/qOlN1qkeAH

The Thanksgiving season is all about giving back to our community. So glad to break bread with @CommishMcCurdy and @MinisterStretch at the Blessed Giving Community Dinner and provide families in Las Vegas with a hot meal. https://t.co/smqyRZ5mfW

#TeamRosen attended the @NVHomelessYouth Summit, joining community leaders to discuss the work being done to combat youth homelessness throughout Nevada, and ensure those struggling have access to the resources and help they need. https://t.co/xX5esaZPqY

Earlier this year, I was proud to vote to admit Sweden and Finland into @NATO and enhance the Alliance’s defense capabilities.

While at #HFX2022, our bipartisan delegation met with @PlJonson to discuss the U.S.-Sweden strategic partnership.

During #HFX2022, we met with the Ukrainian delegation to discuss America’s unwavering commitment to continue providing assistance to Ukraine as they defend against Russia’s brutal and unprovoked invasion. https://t.co/st2CXrYtEN

We need a bipartisan solution for immigration reform to create a pathway to citizenship – keeping families united and growing our economy.

Now is the time to get something done, and I urge my Republican colleagues to meet us at the negotiating table.

Glad to have joined @HFXforum for a successful trip discussing how we can address urgent global security challenges, from supporting Ukraine to maintaining our technological edge, in collaboration with our democratic partners. I look forward to building on these conversations. https://t.co/IOyLxu0WHb

Great meeting with Belarus opposition leader @Tsihanouskaya. We discussed our continued commitment to supporting the pro-democracy movement in Belarus and holding the Lukashenka regime accountable for its human rights abuses and role in enabling Russia’s war against Ukraine.

On #TransgenderDayofRemembrance, we woke up to another attack against the LGBTQ community – we can’t live this way.

Today, while we remember those lost, we must recommit to standing up for justice and speaking out against hateful anti-trans violence, bigotry, and discrimination. https://t.co/uXWFyRMCBv

I’m heartbroken to hear of yet another mass shooting targeting the LGBTQ+ community. Keeping the victims, their families, and all those affected in my thoughts.

We must put an end to this kind of hate and violence.
https://t.co/HqsUcLMYni

Another major win from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law for Nevada's transportation system that will help spur economic development! These kinds of projects for our state are exactly why I worked to write and pass this landmark legislation.

Legally-operating cannabis small businesses in NV & across the country deserve full access to @SBAgov loans & resources.

That’s why I'm introducing a bill to level the playing field & lift the current restrictions that bar cannabis small businesses from accessing SBA loans.

We continue to see an alarming rise in antisemitism across the United States. At our @HSGAC hearing, I was able to secure support from @SecMayorkas and @FBI Director Wray for a national strategy to combat antisemitism. Watch ⬇️ https://t.co/rKbaN7J1J1

We’re excited to announce @NTIAgov has awarded nearly $800K to the Ely Shoshone Tribe in Nevada to improve their access to high-speed internet, strengthening their access to telehealth, online education resources, and workforce development.

NEWS: The House passed @RepMrvan and my bipartisan, bicameral bill to strengthen @DeptVetAffairs' cybersecurity and protect our veterans’ personal information!

I’ll fight to pass it in the Senate and ensure our veterans’ personal information is safe from malicious cyberattacks.

In just one year, NV has received ~$1.7B in funding thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw I helped write & pass.

With historic investments to roads, bridges, clean energy, improved internet access, & more, this law will continue to improve our state.
https://t.co/1wI4yJqNAX
This is serious, and exactly why we need to pass my bipartisan bill with @SenBillCassidy to strengthen the cybersecurity of the healthcare and public health sector.

#DACA ha protegido a los Dreamers, brindándoles acceso al sueño Americano en el único país al que conocen como su hogar.

Me uno al llamado de mis colegas para una acción inmediata para proteger permanentemente a los Dreamers y brindarles un camino hacia la ciudadanía.

#DACA has been a lifeline for Dreamers in Nevada & across our country, giving access to the American Dream in the only country they’ve ever called home.

I join my colleagues in calling for immediate action to permanently protect Dreamers & provide them a path to citizenship.

Years ago, we made a promise to protect Dreamers. The longer we take to act on a permanent solution, the longer they live in uncertainty – awaiting each court decision on the future of DACA.

I met with Dreamers from Las Vegas to discuss the importance of taking action swiftly. https://t.co/WUqq7VgANQ

.@SenCortezMasto and I were excited to welcome students from Beatty High School's "Close Up" program, which was created to ensure all students have access to opportunities to succeed. Thanks for the visit! https://t.co/tWwWicFs4f

I’m looking forward to participating at this year's @HFXforum to address global security challenges. As Russia escalates its invasion of Ukraine and the West faces evolving threats, I’m eager to join this dialogue with my colleagues and our allies. #HFX2022
My thoughts are with John's loved ones and the entire Sparks community, to which John dedicated his life. He will be missed.

Thank you to @NVRuralHousing for stopping by to discuss their important work to improve access to housing for rural Nevadans. Ensuring all Nevadans have a safe place to call home is so important. https://t.co/RTUo4Ik9QJ

✅Protect our public lands
Together, we can get things done. #SOTU

Switching to clean energy will help reduce our greenhouse gas emissions, and legislation like the Clean Energy for America Act will overhaul our tax system to ensure we invest in clean energy solutions.

We need to come together and take action to find common-sense climate solutions. We must work to decrease our greenhouse gas emissions which contribute to the alarming rise in temperature and invest in climate resilient strategies to help prevent disaster.

There is no doubt that we are in a climate crisis. the rising temperatures lead to drought and increases in natural disasters like wildfires. As temperatures continue to go up, these disasters can grow more intense and unstable.

As temperatures rise across the country, we are seeing intense heat that leads to drought, agricultural disruptions, limited water supplies, poor air quality, and increased intensity of the wildfire season.

According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, the entire state of Nevada is experiencing a drought, with nearly half of the state facing “exceptional drought” conditions. This could bring us devastating wildfires and historically low water levels. That’s bad news for Nevadans.
